name: reactions_list-for-team-discussion-legacy
description:
**Deprecation Notice:** This endpoint route is deprecated and will be removed from the Teams API. We recommend migrating your existing code to use the new [`List reactions for a team discussion`](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#list-reactions-for-a-team-discussion) endpoint.

List the reactions to a [team discussion](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/teams#discussions). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/apps/building-oauth-apps/understanding-scopes-for-oauth-apps/).

team_id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

discussion_number.description: The number that identifies the discussion.

content.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/reactions#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a team discussion.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

$block: Reactions to conversations provide a way to help people express their feelings more simply and effectively.
